original: bdag ji ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams la rgyas par brjod pa dang ; dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang gi steng gi nam mkha' la thog bor bar khri'am khri'u rtsa ba 'byung ba la shes bzhin du lcid kyis phab ste /🔽'dug pa dang nyal bar byed ces smod par byed /
analyzed: bdag ji ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams la rgyas par brjod pa dang ; dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang gi steng gi nam mkha' la thog bor bar khri'am khri'u rtsa ba 'byung ba la shes bzhin du lcid kyis phab ste / 'dug pa dang nyal bar byed ces smod par byed /
translated: The monks asked him what had happened, and he told them in detail.🔽The monks who had few desires complained and criticized him,

original: phyar ka gtong bar byed /🔽kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /
analyzed: phyar ka gtong bar byed / kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /
translated: “Why does the monk Udayī knowingly sit down or lie down on a bed or bench with legs that are more than a cubit long in the upper floor of the dwelling of the Saṅgha of monks?”

original: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
analyzed: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
translated: The monks reported this matter to the Blessed One.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga ma bzhin du /
translated: The Blessed One decreed,

original: yang dge slong gang dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang gi steng gi nam mkha' la thog bor bar khri'am khri'u rtsa ba 'byung ba la shes bzhin du lcid kyis phab ste 'dug gam nyal na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
analyzed: yang dge slong gang dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang gi steng gi nam mkha' la thog bor bar khri'am khri'u rtsa ba 'byung ba la shes bzhin du lcid kyis phab ste 'dug gam nyal na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
translated: “Monks, if a monk knowingly sits down or lies down on a bed or bench with legs that are more than a cubit long in the upper floor of the dwelling of the Saṅgha of monks, he becomes guilty of an offense entailing confession.”

original: yul ni mnyan yod /
analyzed: yul ni mnyan yod /
translated: The place was Śrāvastī.

original: gang zag ni nye dga'/
analyzed: gang zag ni nye dga'/
translated: The person was Udayī.

original: nyon mongs pa ni tho 'tshams pa /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa ni tho 'tshams pa /
translated: The affliction is the desire to harm.

original: nyes pa ni dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang gi yang thog tu rtsa ba 'byung ba la 'dug pa'o //
analyzed: nyes pa ni dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang gi yang thog tu rtsa ba 'byung ba la 'dug pa'o //
translated: The misdeed is sitting on a roof of a monastery, with the legs hanging down.

original: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Regarding that, the one who is a monk

analyzed: sh'a kya'i bu nye dga' 'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang @137a * //
translated: is the son of the Śākyas, Upāli, or another who is like that.

original: yin pa'o // dge 'dun gyi zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi'o //
analyzed: yin pa'o // dge 'dun gyi zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi'o //
translated: The Saṅgha’s is that of the Saṅgha of disciples of the Tathāgata.

original: gtsug lag khang gi zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gtsug lag khang gi zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The monastery’s is

original: gang du spyod lam bzhi po 'gro ba dang / 'greng ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba dag byar rung ba'i 'o //
analyzed: gang du spyod lam bzhi po 'gro ba dang / 'greng ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba dag byar rung ba'i 'o //
translated: where the four modes of behavior—walking, standing, sitting, and lying down—are suitable.

original: steng gi nam mkha' la zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: steng gi nam mkha' la zhes bya ba ni /
translated: In the sky above means

original: khang steng gi nam mkha' la'o //
analyzed: khang steng gi nam mkha' la'o //
translated: in the sky above the roof.

original: thog bor bar zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: thog bor bar zhes bya ba ni /
translated: To throw down means

original: rtsva'i thog gam lo ma'i thog bor ba'o //
analyzed: rtsva'i thog gam lo ma'i thog bor ba'o //
translated: to throw down a roof of grass or a roof of leaves.🔽A bed means

original: khri'am zhes bya ba ni khri nyid do //
analyzed: khri'am zhes bya ba ni khri nyid do //
translated: a bed.🔽A bench means

original: khri'u 'am zhes bya ba yang khri'u nyid do //
analyzed: khri'u 'am zhes bya ba yang khri'u nyid do //

analyzed: rtsa ba 'byung ba la zhes bya ba ni rkang pa 'byung ba la'o //
translated: “On the foundation” means on the ground.

original: shes bzhin du zhes bya ba ni de rang nyid kyis rig par gyur pa'am /
analyzed: shes bzhin du zhes bya ba ni de rang nyid kyis rig par gyur pa'am /
translated: “Mindfully” means that he himself is aware of it,

original: gzhan dag gis brjod pas so //
analyzed: gzhan dag gis brjod pas so //
translated: or others tell him.

original: lcid kyis phab ste zhes bya ba ni mthus mnan te'o //
analyzed: lcid kyis phab ste zhes bya ba ni mthus mnan te'o //
translated: “Having pressed down” means having pressed down with force.

analyzed: 'dug gam zhes bya ba ni rkub tshos 'jog par byed na'o //
translated: “Sits down” means he places his buttocks there.

original: nyal na zhes bya ba ni lus bsnyal na'o //
analyzed: nyal na zhes bya ba ni lus bsnyal na'o //
translated: “Lies down” means he lies down his body there.

original: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: “Offense” means as before.

original: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
analyzed: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
translated: Here, the basic offense is defined as follows.🔽If a monk presses down the upper roof of a saṅgha temple,🔽or the upper floor,

original: dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang gi steng gi thog byin gyis gzhol ba nyid dam /
analyzed: dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang gi steng gi thog byin gyis gzhol ba nyid dam /
translated: or the upper roof of a private temple,🔽or the upper floor,🔽or the upper roof of a private house,🔽or the upper floor,🔽or the upper roof of a private building,🔽or the upper floor,🔽or the upper roof of a private structure,

original: spang leb nyid dam /
analyzed: spang leb nyid dam /
translated: or the upper floor,🔽and then sits down or lies down, he commits an offense.

original: de dang 'dra bas g-yogs pa nyid ma yin par gnan par 'os pa khri la sogs pa'i rtsa ba phur bu ltar dbyung ba dang / gzhug tu rung ba dang ; bkan pa nyid dang / rkang rten bcug pa nyid ma yin par shes bzhin du lcid kyis phab ste gnon par byed na rtsa ba 'byung ba la 'dug pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dang 'dra bas g-yogs pa nyid ma yin par gnan par 'os pa khri la sogs pa'i rtsa ba phur bu ltar dbyung ba dang / gzhug tu rung ba dang ; bkan pa nyid dang / rkang rten bcug pa nyid ma yin par shes bzhin du lcid kyis phab ste gnon par byed na rtsa ba 'byung ba la 'dug pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
translated: If one sits down on a bed or the like that is not to be sat upon, and that is not covered with something similar, and that has a base that is not to be dug out like a stake, and that is not to be inserted, and that is not to be bent, and that is not to be put in with a foot, and one sits down on it with one’s full weight, one commits the actual downfall of sitting down on a base that is dug out.

original: 'di'i byed pa po ni dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang gi steng gi thog nyid dang / gnan par 'os pa khri la sogs pa'i rtsa ba 'byung ba nyid gnon pa la 'du shes gtso cher byed pa po nyid yin no //
analyzed: 'di'i byed pa po ni dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang gi steng gi thog nyid dang / gnan par 'os pa khri la sogs pa'i rtsa ba 'byung ba nyid gnon pa la 'du shes gtso cher byed pa po nyid yin no //
translated: The agent of this downfall is one who is on the roof of a monastery, or who is sitting down on a bed or the like that is not to be sat upon, and who is sitting down on a base that is dug out, and who is mainly focused on the perception of sitting down.

original: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /🔽dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang gi steng gi thog byin gyis gzhol ba nyid dam /
analyzed: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te / dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang gi steng gi thog byin gyis gzhol ba nyid dam /
translated: In this case, the actual downfall is completed by five factors:🔽the roof of a monastery is covered with plaster;

original: spang leb nyid dam /
analyzed: spang leb nyid dam /
translated: or it is covered with planks;

original: de dang 'dra bas g-yogs pa nyid ma yin pa dang / gnan par 'os pa khri la sogs pa'i rtsa ba 'byung ba bkan pa nyid dam /
analyzed: de dang 'dra bas g-yogs pa nyid ma yin pa dang / gnan par 'os pa khri la sogs pa'i rtsa ba 'byung ba bkan pa nyid dam /
translated: and it is not the same as the root of a throne, etc., which is fit to be sat upon, which is not bent, or which has a footrest inserted.

original: rkang rten bcug pa nyid ma yin pa dang / der 'du shes pa dang / ljid kyis phab pa dang / gnon pa'o //
analyzed: rkang rten bcug pa nyid ma yin pa dang / der 'du shes pa dang / ljid kyis phab pa dang / gnon pa'o //
translated: It is the perception of that, the placing of one’s weight on it, and the act of pressing down.

original: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
analyzed: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
translated: If any of these factors are incomplete, one is not faulted, as appropriate.
